000000010 //ls r0, #2 
000100011 //rs r0, #3
001000010 //and r0, r1 
001100010 //or r0, r1
010000111 //ldi r0, #7
010110000 // ldr r2, r0
011010000 //str r2, r0
100101100 //eq R1, R2 
011111010 //bnz R3, R1
100000010 //geq r0, r1 
101001010 //neg r1, r1 
101100010 //add r0, r1
110000011 //addi r0, #3
110100010 //neq r0, r1
